rules_text:
Enchant land
When this Aura enters, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among the cards milled this way into your hand.
Enchanted land has “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
notes:
Enchant creature or land
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+3 and has reach.
Enchanted permanent has “T: Add two mana in any combination of colors.”
FLAG too much fixing
